## Customer Data 123
```{r}
aryan1 <- read.csv("Dataset_Aryan/Customer_Data.csv", header = TRUE)
aryan1 <- aryan1[, -1]
aryan1 <- na.omit(aryan1)

hopkins_val <- hopkins(aryan1, m = ceiling(nrow(aryan1) / 10))
hopkins_val
```
